item.title: Has K.P. Energy Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: K.P. Energy Ltd has declared a 4% dividend, with an ex-date of January 28, 2026. While recent returns have been negative, the company has shown significant long-term growth, particularly with a 5-year total return of 2591.71%. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has Mastek Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Mastek Ltd has declared a dividend of 160%, amounting to ₹16 per share, with an ex-date of January 30, 2026. While the company has shown mixed total returns over various periods, it has delivered positive returns over the long term, particularly a total return of 87.79% over the last 5 years. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has KPI Green Energy Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: KPI Green Energy Ltd has declared a 4% dividend, with an ex-date of January 28, 2026. While recent returns have been volatile, the company has shown significant long-term growth, particularly with a total return of 6320.28% over the past five years. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has Orient Electric Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Orient Electric Ltd has declared a dividend of 75% (₹0.75 per share) with an ex-date of January 29, 2026. However, total returns over various periods have shown a consistent decline in price, indicating challenges for investors despite the dividend. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has Jindal Stainless Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Jindal Stainless Ltd has declared a dividend of 50%, amounting to ₹2 per share, with an ex-date of January 29, 2026. The company has demonstrated strong total returns over various periods, with a total return of 786.68% over the past five years. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has Shanthi Gears Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Shanthi Gears Ltd. has declared a dividend of 300%, with an ex-date of January 29, 2026. The company has shown varying total returns over different periods, with significant long-term growth. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has Wendt India Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Wendt India Ltd has declared a dividend of 200% (₹20 per share) with an ex-date of January 28, 2026. While the dividend yield is 0.73%, total returns have been negative in the short to medium term but show positive growth over the longer term. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has KEI Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, KEI Industries Ltd has declared a dividend of 225%, amounting to ₹4 per share, with an ex-date of January 28, 2026. While recent total returns have been mixed, the company has shown substantial growth over the past five years. Time: 25 minutes ago

item.title: Has IIFL Finance Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, IIFL Finance Ltd has declared a dividend of 200%, amounting to ₹4 per share, with an ex-date of January 25, 2024. Total returns over the last 5 years reached 363.64%, highlighting strong long-term performance. Time: 25 minutes ago
